EmailTemplate.name: Feb19Webinar-ClientReadiness.We Missed You Feb19
EmailTemplate.subject: Since You Missed it - Resources from our Client Readiness Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Sorry we missed you at MBO's webinar titled "Client Readiness: Are you Ready to Benefit from the IC Movement?" held on Tuesday, February 19. Dennis Kanegaye, President of MBO Partners - Enterprise Solutions, discussed how organizations can better prepare themselves for an independent contractor engagement program or optimize their existing program. Below you will find related material. We hope you find it informative: Webinar Slide Deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Webinar_2013_Are_You_Ready_for_the_IC_Movement.pdf> SIG Webinar Series <http://sig.org/webinars.php> Connect with Dennis <http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=104223&locale=en_US&trk=tyah> Client Readiness Blog <http://mboenterprise.com/blog/are-you-ready-independent-workforce-movement>
